body_html:
Automatic differentiation will eventually be in, though closer to 1.0. Are you looking for C API support for use in another language or are you using C++ directly? We consider those separate APIs, but both should have something reasonable for defining graphs (though no shape inference or automatic differentiation, yet) in the next TensorFlow release (0.10.0) -- they are both checked in at head.

C++ graph-definition API update:
25ac3da

C graph-definition API was a few commits, I'm having trouble tracking them all down.

We consider those separate APIs, but both should have something reasonable for defining graphs (though no shape inference or automatic differentiation, yet) in the next TensorFlow release (0.10.0) -- they are both checked in at head.

C graph-definition API was a few commits, I'm having trouble tracking them all down.
body:
Automatic differentiation will eventually be in, though closer to 1.0.  Are you looking for C API support for use in another language or are you using C++ directly?  We consider those separate APIs, but both should have something reasonable for defining graphs (though no shape inference or automatic differentiation, yet) in the next TensorFlow release (0.10.0) -- they are both checked in at head.

C++ graph-definition API update: 
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/25ac3dabfa3af7a313eb46b03690117c85030cc2

C graph-definition API was a few commits, I'm having trouble tracking them all down.
